subject: Delay in delivery regarding #SSN4704
description_text:
I have paid for the express delivery but as I see the shipping details now
it’s going to take atleast 10 days is what I see.
I would request to provide the compensation for the delivery fee. £23 is
not a small amount, if I add another £20 or so I could have purchased the
rumble motor.
So kindly provide the refund or equivalent coupon or compensation.

Regards
Nijohn

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8671 中
